akas: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (original title)
akas from release info: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (original title)

-1.title: SoCal Sting

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

-1.plot: When a California mother of two is stabbed to death in her bedroom, police can't find any incriminating evidence; the case goes cold for years until a new detective uncovers a tiny clue that leads to an undercover sting to catch the killer.

1.title: Family Secrets

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: All appears well in this upscale suburb of Detroit. But when a mother of two is bludgeoned to death and then stabbed repeatedly in her own garage, police and the community are shocked when the investigation leads close to home.

2.title: A Secret Affair

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: When an openly gay student is brutally murdered police must investigate every lead. And some will lead where they don't wish to follow. Four young boys live in horrific conditions, will they live long enough to be free?

3.title: The Professor's Wife

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: The wife of an internationally renowned Ivy League professor is murdered, and the killer is the last person anyone would have expected, and a Phoenix postman is accused of murder and is sentenced to death, but did he do it? Follow his story.

4.title: Fools for Love

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: An Ohio woman is implicated in murder, was she the puppet master or an innocent bystander? Even the prosecutor has his doubts. When a young girl from Idaho is kidnapped only the gut instinct of two strangers can save her.

5.title: The Unlikeliest Suspect

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: When John and Susan Sutton are shot in their Florida home, Susan is killed, and John survives, but he is blinded for life. Could this be the work of one of John's high-end legal clients? As information surfaces investigators start looking closer to home.

6.title: On the Killer's Trail

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: An innocent career woman is murdered on her daily walk, only a lucky tip can stop the case from closing. A California girl is kidnapped and abused, with no hope of escape, her fate rests upon the help of strangers.

7.title: A Mother's Mission

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: An Alaska Teenager is found murdered and sexually assaulted. It will take a mother's love and almost two decades to find the killer. A high speed chase ensues when a girl is kidnapped, but will the police be fast enough?

8.title: The Heart Knows

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: The death of a healthy young mother of two devastates her family. But was there foul play as the prosecutors suspect? The Jury must decide. A friendly internet encounter becomes a hellish nightmare in the real world.

9.title: Blinding Ambition

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: A German national comes to the U.S., adopts the manners of the super wealthy, and passes himself off as a Rockefeller. And, when a rape victim's eyewitness testimony helps put an innocent man in prison, he works to expose the real rapist from behind bars.

10.title: Haunting Memory

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: A college student is sexually assaulted at a party. Two decades later, a letter in the mail brings back the painful memories, but also a possible chance for justice. And, first generation immigrant, Shawndell, disappears and detectives suspect foul play.

11.title: The Great Pretender

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Wyndi Cooper married the man of her dreams until she realizes he was an accomplished conman with other wives. And, Dino and his wife Clara do everything together. When Clara ends up dead, police try to find the culprit and end up looking close to home?

12.title: Web of Lies

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: A German national comes to the U.S., adopts the manners of the super wealthy, and passes himself off as a Rockefeller. And, when a rape victim's eyewitness testimony helps put an innocent man in prison, he works to expose the real rapist from behind bars.

13.title: The Missing Mom

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: Michigan Mom goes missing, her husband Doug has a strong alibi but becomes a suspect when his alibi evaporates in a twist. Young South Carolina girl is kidnapped and held captive in an underground bunker by a sexual predator.

1.title: Murder in the Applegate

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Hard-working family man Chris MacCallum disappears while on a camping trip deep in the forest along the border of California and Oregon. And when detectives start to unravel the mystery, all roads lead to an unthinkable suspect...

2.title: The Deadly Deceiver

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: In Silicon Valley, young mother Reina Swierski is reported missing not by her husband Gary, but by her lover Ted. The search to find her goes on for years, eventually unmasking a violent and deadly predator.

3.title: Justice for Jane Doe

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: In Silicon Valley, young mother Reina Swierski is reported missing - not by her husband Gary, but by her lover Ted. The search to find her goes on for years, eventually unmasking a violent - and deadly - predator.

4.title: See Something, Say Something

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: When the murdered body of Miami pediatric nurse Beverly Jackson is discovered under the most shocking of circumstances, her family is devastated. In the end, it takes the bravery of one young witness to finally crack the case.

5.title: The House on Q Street

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: When 91-year-old Washington VIP Viola Drath is found dead on her bathroom floor in her tony Georgetown townhouse, it appears she's simply the victim of a nasty fall. But the subsequent investigation into her death unravels a lifetime of violent secrets inside the House on Q Street.

6.title: Harvesting Murder

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Police discover a woman shot dead in a Catskills vacation house, just before it goes up in flames. The terrible conflagration masks even more terrible secrets, three deaths and a mystery that spans years - in this stranger-than-fiction tale.

7.title: Fool's Gold

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: When the nearly naked corpse of an older man is found along a horse path in Westchester, no one seems to know who he is. But after unraveling his identity, detectives are led on a four-state investigation -and learn his murder was based on a mistake.

8.title: Foster Fiction

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: When a 3-year-old child goes missing from a Cincinnati Park, the community mobilizes in a massive hunt. But before long, detectives realize that not all is as it seems to be and uncover a terrible secret.

9.title: Fit to Kill

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: When beautiful fitness-fanatic Donna Zinetti is discovered brutally stabbed to death on a jogging path, detectives immediately suspect her recently-estranged husband, Keith Longtin. But not everything is as it appears.

10.title: Bones of Contention

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: When Chicago detectives launch a program to identify the remains of eight victims of an infamous serial killer, they find themselves unexpectedly solving a 35-year-old homicide.

1.title: Murder in the Mellen Patch

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: A body is found engulfed in flames in a Los Angeles alley. He's thought to be the victim of brutal gang violence, but a tip soon leads police to the victim's ex. When new evidence is unearthed years later, it's clear the police were dead wrong.

2.title: Payable Upon Death

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: A terminally ill 87-year-old man is found dead from an apparent fall down his basement steps. But detectives soon realize the scene has been staged. Who stands to gain from the quick death of a dying man?

3.title: Capital Predator

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: In the shadow of the nation's capital, a mysterious death on a Marine base confounds the NCIS -- was it an accident, or was it a homicide? It won't be long before police are hunting a violent sexual predator whose trail leads right back to the base.

4.title: The Death Chat Room

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: A strange case of a missing college co-ed pulls detectives into a disturbing online world. The investigation spans the globe and ends in Minnesota where an internet predator is unmasked.

5.title: For Better, or For Murder

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Corey and Monique Kitts seem to be living the American dream with two children, a successful business, and a beautiful home. But when Monique and her children discover Corey's bullet-riddled body, the truth about their picture-perfect lives is revealed.

6.title: Never Stop Looking

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Ruth Vosseler's estranged husband takes their two young sons on an overnight trip in 1986, but they never return. Ruth's frantic search for her fugitive ex-husband and two young boys spans 28 years and unearths dark family secrets.

7.title: The Wrong Crowd

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: A troubled young mother mysteriously vanishes from her new home in Benson, Arizona where she had moved for a chance at a fresh start. Police uncover the truth of Devvra's disappearance when tips lead them through the seedy underbelly of Benson.

8.title: Domestic Terror

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: In El Cajon, California - a haven for Iraqi refugees - a young mother is brutally attacked in her home and left fighting for her life. A note left at the crime scene lead police to believe it was a hate crime. Was Shaima's Iraqi community also in danger?

9.title: Deadly Grudge

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: A brazen assassination in a small Texas town sets the community on edge. With the killers on the loose, a team of special investigators tries to solve the case. They uncover a vicious revenge plot, but can they nail the killers before they become targets?

10.title: Witness to Murder

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: The peace in a small town is shattered when a Muslim couple is gunned down on the street. Though badly injured, the husband survives and tells police the gunmen yelled racial slurs before firing. But was hate the only motivation for this heinous crime?

1.title: Alibis or Accomplices

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: After he clashes with co-workers, Tom Monfils mysteriously disappears on the job at a Green Bay paper mill. Soon enough it looks like murder, but no one is talking to detectives. Is it a conspiracy of silence, or a tragic miscarriage of justice?

2.title: Taunting Evil

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: A mother of four goes missing before testifying against her abusive boyfriend.

3.title: Young Mom Missing

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: A young mother from Austin, Texas suddenly drops out of contact. Police believe she may be taking a break somewhere, possibly with a new man. But Julie's family fears the worst.

4.title: If I Can't Have You

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: A talented graduate student is nursing a broken heart, when she's swept off her feet by someone new. But as their relationship progresses, revelations make it clear nothing is quite what it appears to be.

5.title: The AM Rapist

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: In Phoenix, a wave of late night sexual assaults appear to be the work of a serial rapist, who targets women in their own homes while they sleep.

6.title: Ghosts of Great Falls

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: In 1995 three members of a wealthy Taiwanese family living in Virginia disappear. Rumor has it they died overseas but when detectives investigate, they find answers closer to home.

7.title: Checks and Balances

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: A prominent psychiatrist and his adult son are killed execution style. When police can't find a suspect, the case goes cold. But when an attempted armored car robbery provides an odd link to the double homicide months later, a motive is revealed.

8.title: We've Got Your Daughter

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: When Jamey Walker, a young woman with a bright future is kidnapped and murdered in the spring of 1981, her mother Eleanor dedicates the rest of her life to finding the killer in hopes of finding justice for Jamey.

9.title: Missing Blue Eyes

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: When 12 year-old Courtney LeBlanc is kidnapped from her home, her family fears she's fallen prey to a serial killer terrorizing the community. Local investigators enlist the help of the FBI and their search reveals a predator hiding in plain sight.

10.title: Tattooed in Memory

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: Kidnapped just steps from her home, a 15-year-old girl is brutally assaulted and left for dead in Denver's South Platte River.

1.title: The Gulfcoast Vanishings

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: In Southwest Florida, Terrance Williams, a young father, disappears. As his mother retraces his steps she uncovers something ominous: the last known person to see Terrance alive has a strange and disturbing connection to another missing man.

2.title: Home Alone

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: In Southwest Florida, Terrance Williams, a young father, disappears. As his mother retraces his steps she uncovers something ominous: the last known person to see Terrance alive has a strange and disturbing connection to another missing man.

3.title: The Painted Parademic

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: When a paramedic and mother is found dead and covered in paint in the basement of her Massachusetts home, investigators must work tirelessly for 18 months to find the person responsible.

4.title: It Could Have Been Me

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Two teenage girls fall for men who seem to care about them. Instead, the girls are lured into human trafficking and coerced into prostitution.

5.title: Wife's Double Life

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: When a young husband is thrown in jail for the murder of his newlywed wife, most people in their small Oklahoma community believed the case was solved. But odd cell tower records and surprising DNA evidence force investigators to take a second look.

6.title: Code of Silence

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: In St. Petersburg, Florida, Cabretti Wheeler and his friend Kyle Ellis are killed. When the only eye-witness vanishes, it's up to Cabretti's mom, Lisa Wheeler, to help police solve the case, even if it means risking her own life for justice.

7.title: Speaking from the Grave

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Margaret Purk is just days away from having her first baby when, after an apparent suicide by hanging, she and her unborn son are dead. Twenty-four years later, new clues lead investigators to re-open the case. Was this suicide actually a homicide?

8.title: The Vanishing Clerk

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: On an Easter Sunday, 18-year-old Heidi Allen vanishes from her convenience store job. Two brothers are arrested for the kidnapping, but only one is convicted. Years later, a chilling new story emerges implicating three other men in the crime.

9.title: Eyes Like Daddy

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: On an Easter Sunday, 18-year-old Heidi Allen vanishes from her convenience store job. Two brothers are arrested for the kidnapping, but only one is convicted. Years later, a chilling new story emerges implicating three other men in the crime.

10.title: SoCal Sting

episode of.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: Story of the murder of Kelley Clayton, a 35-year-old mom of two, who was killed by a hitman, Michael Beard, hired by her husband, Tom.

imdb.plot outline: In each one-hour episode, Tamron Hall is joined by a core team of correspondents with extensive knowledge of law enforcement and a passion for storytelling. Series goes beyond the headlines to explore not only what happened, but why it happened, and how it was investigated.
imdb.title: Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall
plot: In each one-hour episode, Tamron Hall is joined by a core team of correspondents with extensive knowledge of law enforcement and a passion for storytelling. Series goes beyond the headlines to explore not only what happened, but why it happened, and how it was investigated.::ID
